def_cn: (人群的)蜂拥，狂奔;(动物的)惊逃，乱窜
def_en: If there is a stampede, a group of people or animals run in a wild, uncontrolled way.

def_cn: (使)争先恐后地奔逃;(使)惊逃
def_en: If a group of animals or people stampede or if something stampedes them, they run in a wild, uncontrolled way.

def_cn: 热潮;风尚;争先恐后的现象
def_en: If a lot of people all do the same thing at the same time, you can describe it as a stampede .
If people are stampeded into doing something, they are forced into doing it by pressure from other people, even though they do not think it is the right thing to do.
